name: Warning Banner
description: Displays a warning banner in certain contexts, configured by an administrator. Examples include warning survey participants that the project is still in development, warning users that the project is a practice project and should not be used to collect data.

system-settings.name: Enable warning for development projects (excludes practice projects) on project pages

Development warning text for project users. Default: This project is not yet approved to collect real data.
You must NOT send survey invitations until the project has been approved by an administrator.
You may test surveys yourself or send to pilot testers.
Enable warning for development projects (excludes practice projects) on survey pages

Development warning text for survey respondents. Default: This project is not yet approved to collect real data.
Unless you are a pilot tester, you should STOP NOW.
Enable warning for practice projects on project pages

Practice project warning text for project users. Default: This project is only for practice/testing purposes and is not for collecting real data.
You must NOT send survey invitations to research participants.
Enable warning for practice projects on survey pages

Practice project warning text for survey respondents. Default: This project is only for practice/testing purposes and is not for collecting real data.
Unless you are a pilot tester, you should STOP NOW.
